values:
"Even if there are people who might move on to something else, we have fans who are there for us without change. That's everything to us." (Sakurai) "No~t at all. As long as the five of us are happy anyone can pass over us; whether they pass over us or not is something I have no interest in at all." (Ohno) "Hmm... now that I think about it, I don't think aiming for the top meant we were going to fight others for it. If we can make the people who support us happy, that would be the true top." (Aiba) "Our circumstances right now is just a hindsight-based opinion. There's always a sense of danger because we don't know what's going to happen after this. Isn't that the price we have to pay for taking on the responsibilities of doing this kind of work?" (Matsumoto) "I know that idols are cool when they retire manfully at their peaks, but we're not manly. (laugh) We'll be clinging on forever!" (Ninomiya)
If you have not read the translations for Pia, YOU SHOULD!

I blame my aniki for these. Justin Bieber vs Beethoven Ask Bach I've got more cock than Smith and Wesson Einstein vs Stephen Hawking Cause that means Albert E equals M C squared Dr Seuss vs Shakespeare I would not could not on a boat

I'm slow in realising that the author who wrote "The Mortal Instruments" series is the same person who wrote "The Draco Trilogy" series that led to the biggest plagiarism wank of all time for the HP-fanfic fandom. Then again, I have never read any of her works and I would have continued on blissfully ignorant if not for a friend who brought up the name "Cassandra Clare". Though it does make me ponder the idea of returning to fanfic writing seeing how big some of them have become despite the mediocre plot and characterisation *cough*50shades*cough* I should get back to trying to answer the cheem questions my lecturer set regarding SPED and special needs children. Kind of wish for one of those self-writing quills to jot down everything I have said because I have such a hard time transferring them to written words. And I made such a compelling speech to my aniki to boot. me: do you know what's hyperlexia? aniki: is that when someone gets so cold they freeze their balls off? me: that's hypothermia.

Just came back from Bali last night! Great trip, great company, ironically missing a tan because we were in the bus most of the time. Also got confused with the currency that my best buy for myself is

I'm totally suffering from buyer's remorse at the moment. And no, while the world ogles over the new iOS6 and launch of iPhone5 today...

I upped and bought a Samsung Galaxy SIII!

(it's the buying of the gift pack that makes me feels)

Oh well! HAPPY EARLY BIRTHDAY TO ME XD

So it has been 5 years since I first know about my mice band a.k.a. ONE OK ROCK. Like everything else, I really want to see them live. Be it Fate or Spies, ONE OK ROCK will coming here to me instead. And today was the sale of the tickets. I was extremely worried because of all the weekends, I have to attend a 2-days 1st aid course and couldn't go down personally to buy. But thankful with the help of my friend's daughter who went down despite the rain, she got them for me. 30th June, I look forward to it!

Work life is currently hectic like mad!

Going through my 2nd practicum and keep having to reschedule the prac dates due to sudden changes in my school schedule. Hopefully everything goes smoothly!

The bigger problem is the new centre that joined us due to the elections... 

All the teachers including the principal upped and resigned!

The two monsters singing "Moves Like Jagger".

Think I need to go to another doctor or try Chinese medicine for my cough.
I have no idea what's going on with LJ since I'm not exactly a paid user. But for whatever reason, I made a DW account. You can add me @untestsubject there.

So not only did I get to meet Fujiwara Tatsuya face-to-face the other day, I heard my face got on ZIP! today ... ALAMAK! I hope they edit it well and not make me sound like an airhead. Wait! Did I even look okay that day? It was so tiring rushing from class to Nex (even if it was next to my school but the standing for almost 2 hours) to Cathay.

On the flip side, work did not approve my leave citing that I have not been present for a lot of planning time. How is that MY fault when they are the ones who decided to send me for a full-time study right before June term break? All I am asking for is 5-days leave in DECEMBER when I have no class and there is no kids to teach to have a proper holiday with my family!

Pissed off does not even graze the tip of how I am feeling right now. I feel even more disappointed especially after personally asking the SP if I can take off and she said "Sure not a problem" only to get stabbed like this. And the VP lurking around causing trouble is seriously treading on my last patience.
THE NIGHT I SAW LIGHT AKA FUJIWARA TATSUYA

Mice band's new album out! Seriously want the full PV for "C.h.a.o.s.m.y.t.h." Full song here. Dream as if you'll live forever. Live as if you'll die today. - James Dean And yes, it's part of the lyrics! And "Pierce" is so much~ love! And something not from this album but a cover of Stevie Wonder's "To Feel The Fire".
HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO ME~!!! I TURN 5 TODAY (AS SAID BY MY FRIEND). 2-6 IN AN ALTERNATE UNIVERSE.

The good, the bad and the... unexpected of the Shinee's con yesterday. Good Free milk tea Meeting up with Joey and My Silly Girl Bad Iffy security that needs to get shot Crappy sound system Unexpected Elevator that refused to move fast at all Usually celebs would travel in vans with extremely tinted windows but... THE BEST 3 SECONDS OF THE WHOLE NIGHT!!!

It's been ages since I last updated. Mainly due to work, school and never-ending ASSignments. Tak sempat pun nak mintak maaf dengan korang semua yang kat lj dan fb. Anyway, I hope everyone is doing fine, feeling fine and looking fine. Wishing for more wonderful things to come. Love, moi.
I have no words except for a very, very huge THANK YOU to the greatest bunch of ladies who got these for me.

watching the concert on a theatre screen with plushy seats is just. so. GOOD!!! despite having to climb a mountain to reach the place XD and this concert is seriously beyond expectation. epic faces and fails, monkeying around, live singing and just about any pairing together. thanks to the lovely ladies for organising it, the others we met there and of course... ARASHI!!! i wanna go to another concert yo.

just gonna post this up for my own understanding because it is way easier when you can associate yourself with all these old men theories:

uncle piaget says you must learn by yourself and there are 4 stages to cognitive development. sensorimotor is from 0 to 2 years, preoperational is from 2 to 7, concrete operational is from 7 to 11 and formal operational is from 11 onwards and since we are doing early childhood we concentrate on sensorimotor which is further divided into 6 substages: reflexes from birth to 1 month, primary circular reaction from 1 to 4 months, secondary circular reactions from 4 to 8 months, coordination of secondary circular reaction from 8 to 12 months, tertiary circular reactions from 12 to 18 months and mental representation from 18 to 24 months.

but uncle piaget he is a bit of a loner so he doesn't think that you need ppl. so in comes uncle vygotsky who says no we must have ppl and human interaction because culture and all that shitz is important. piaget says you cannot skip a stage in development, vygotsky agree but he says that you can instead speed up the stage if you have others around to help you. unfortunately uncle vygotsky died young from tb and they never got to meet up to discuss things in depth.

then comes uncle bruner (who is still alive btw) talking about constructivist theory which i am still reading up on. scaffolding is his idea whereby a child with the guidance of a more knowledgeable person can narrow the gap of zone of proximal development faster.

new hair new hair better than permed hair
Even with the huge-ass buckteeth, I'm diggin' his new do and will jump him regardless!!! ps. the inner side is actually shaved.
if he already had this do when they filmed shiya and yesterday's vs, why the hell did zero's stylist make him look like a stuffed pregnant penguin with a choked bow tie? screw professionalism - give us pretty sho on zero!

Satoshi and his seasonal change in necklace. The latest addition to his collection. It is a bow and arrow design. And the OSM (awesome) OT3! PS. FOUND IT! It is another Cailly Coo design. Not a Cupid bow and arrow as we thought but a sign for Sagittarius.

holy fish! i just got egged through my bedroom window. suddenly there was some "pop pop ketong" sound coming from the window sill so i went to check and found this on the floor by my bed: ppl! don't waste perfectly good food even if you are sick and tired of eggs. go cook at the kitchen not the bedroom or if you are practising your juggling - use balls! or at least, close your window so that it won't drop into the room of the person living on the 2nd floor.

to my lj singaporean/malaysian buddies

ada sesiapa yang kenal bunkface?

while it's not exactly a drama (yet) but i finally get to see my darling riko with arashi!!! and to top it up, kachang was totally teasing her when he wore that old school swimming costume outfit.

in today's news, went for another round of gattsun and met up with lots of new people haha i didn't even know who was going to be there :P nice to finally put faces to lj names.

to those ladies if you are reading this, you may add me on twitter too @untestsubject.

- dunadan

most of us are awake following the results for our ge. wp got hougang again - congrats! joo chiat losing by only 382 votes is really sad but the thing that pissed me off is that cmi woman being part of our parliament now... our future going to the longkang with kate spade bags. and it doesn't help either the shallow thinking of someone whose only concern is for... kpop. seriously wtf lah kpop is irrelevant to the future governing of our country. thank god she cannot vote yet but if this is the state of mind of those brainwashed grassroot kids, they are all in the same boat as that cmi tpl woman. kena sai! i feel so disappointed with the level of idiocy that seems to be sprouting out. i hope we see more of nicole seah for sure. ps. congrats to aljunied grc for going to the opposition! we salute the people there even if they lost george yeo. you don't need to get on your knees and repent... except maybe pray for tpl to go away- far, far away with her *act cute* and hit her with a real spade not just kate.
my condolences to <lj user=niangeline> and family for their loss. girl, you take care of yourself and your siblings. anything you can call me at anytime.

Somehow I was listening to TIME album on repeat and it struck me. The songs are so apt and by that, I mean most of the titles sent me and Jess into smiles.

ROCK YOU, WAVE, KAZE, YABAI YABAI YABAI *cough* LIFE!!!

BE WITH YOU, CRY FOR YOU, CAN'T LET YOU GO, FRIENDSHIP, FIREFLY, AOZORA PEDAL, NIJI.

SONG FOR ME, LOVE SITUATION, LOVE SO SWEET.

OH YEAH, WE CAN MAKE IT, EVERYBODY ZENSHIN, CARRY ON, TAIYOU NO SEKAI.

Still praying all the best for those in Japan.

was reading on twitter. somehow the mere presence of shochi appearing in zero today sent a shot of relief and triggered tears for a lot of people. in times like this you realised how big of an impact idols and celebrities have on lives. a ray of hope to work towards the future. and yes, i am thankful that the boys are safe, alive and well.
